sub_title: Social Impact | Sustainability | Stakeholder Engagement & Collaborative Partnerships | Chevening Alumni
summary:
Milambo is a Social Impact driver with experience on a decade leading social investments.  She has directed projects assessing impact to generate evidence for better programmes and policies in multiple sectors that include education, health, agriculture and governance in Africa. She has also contributed to exploratory social investments in West and East Africa, and Latin America. 

Leveraging her lived and work experiences, she has advised global business leaders and high net-worth individuals on their philanthropic work by designing projects and programmes aimed at creating impact and tackling social, economic, and environmental challenges in their areas of operation.

Her portfolio includes; managing 12 junior managers, 300 support staff and overseeing investments that total over $1,000,000. She has also built and managed relationships with governments, academics, businesses and donors on local investments that include UNICEF, the World Bank and GIZ
Working in different capacities over the years, she has collaborated with teams in Europe, the Americas and Africa. 

Her interests are in leading inclusive investments for the most underserved groups, businesses and communities. She is currently open to opportunities aimed at making investments with impact.
